content:
Construction of the University of Georgias newest freshman dorm Building  began in December  PERIOD The construction is expected to be complete by Fall  which means residents of nearby halls must tolerate the distractions for at least another academic year PERIOD

Creswell Hall residents shared their thoughts on the ongoing construction and how it has affected their living experience PERIOD
